title: Description of the roles and access of the Super Admin
content: Super Admin access is normally reserved for the owner of the Emprez account.You must send a request to a member of our team to change the status of your current Administrator account. We will notify you when the change is made.It is not uncommon for a company to have more than one account with Super Administrator access. Although a user with administrator access can make the request to our team for the creation of another administrator access, he has no right of access to them once access is given. The role of the Super Admin makes it possible to circumvent this limitation.Any user account to which the role of Super Admin is assigned has the same rights as an Admin account. However, with Super Admin access, any employee search performed in the service also displays the information of the other administrator accounts assigned to the Emprez account and also allows access to be modified.Super Admin access thus allows the owner of the Emprez account to revoke the administrator access of a person, if that person leaves office, for example. Follow the instructions here to complete an Emprez account.Here is a general summary table of the access rights of a Super Admin compared to a standard Administrator and a Manager:â€‹Helpful?00Updated: 4 years ago Share :
